statements: DELETE FROM vendor_relationships WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
DELETE FROM vendor_relationships WHERE vendor_id = 100 AND vendor_name = 'ABC Company';
DELETE FROM vendor_relationships WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM vendor_relationships WHERE vendor_name = 'XYZ Corp' AND contact_email = 'contact@xyz.com';
DELETE FROM vendor_details WHERE vendor_id = 100 AND contact_email = 'example@email.com';
DELETE FROM procurement_logs WHERE action_type = 'Invoice Rejected';
DELETE FROM compliance_reports WHERE vendor_id = 2 AND compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant';
DELETE FROM contracts WHERE vendor_id = 3 AND start_date = '2022-01-01';
